org.jpac.plc

Class IntRxTx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.RxTx
      • org.jpac.plc.IntRxTx

  • public class IntRxTx
extends RxTx
    Used to transfer a signed 16 bit (INT) value between the java application and the plc. Can be used standalone or in the context of a complex data structure (STRUCT)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jpac.plc.RxTx

        address, conn, data, dataOffset, rxReq, rxTrans, txReq, txTrans

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntRxTx

        public IntRxTx(Connection conn,
               Address address,
               int dataOffset,
               Data data)
        throws IndexOutOfRangeException
        Parameters:
        conn - an open TCP/IP connection to the plc
        address - address of the data item exchanged with the plc
        dataOffset - the byte offset inside RxTx.data, holding the data item to be exchanged with the plc
        data - instance of Data used to hold the data item exchanged with the plc.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfRangeException

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public IntRxTx read()
             throws java.io.IOException
        used to read the data item from plc and store it inside RxTx.data.
        Overrides:
        read in class RxTx
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • set

        public IntRxTx set(int value)
            throws AddressException,
                   ValueOutOfRangeException
        used to set the data item to a given value.
        The data item is written to RxTx.data first.
        The actual transfer to the plc is done by invocation of writeInt(): aRxTx.set(aValue).writeInt();
        Parameters:
        value - a value
        Returns:
        this. Useful in cases where the data item should be written to the plc immediately (see above).
        Throws:
        AddressException
        ValueOutOfRangeException

      • get

        public int get()
        throws AddressException
        used to retrieve the current value of the data item.
        The data item is locally retrieved from data.
        to get the actual value from the plc use read() first: value = aRxTx.read().get();
        Returns:
        value
        Throws:
        AddressException

      • getSize

        public static int getSize()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
